content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What does the company do?\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ahold Delhaize is an international retail food store and e-commerce company. The main markets are the US, Europe and Indonesia. They have 18 well-known local brands, including Giant, Food Lion, Peapod, Albert Heijn, Delhaize and bol.com.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With 414k employees, they operate 7,137 stores in Europe and the US. They are servicing 54M customers every week, generating EUR 74.7B of revenue in 2020. Around 10% of that is through online sales, a segment that has been rapidly growing over the last years.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Their strategy is around the following main growth drivers:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Drive omnichannel growth - specifically driving growth through online sales). Examples are bol.com (online platform like Amazon) and the 2020 acquisition of FreshDirect (leading online grocer in the U.S., delivering directly to customers across the New York, Philadelphia and Washington, D.C. metropolitan areas).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Elevate healthy and sustainable - high margins and addressing changing customer preferences.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cultivate best talent - despite online sales growth, a lot of their business is around people, and they can (and should) make a difference in productivity and customer satisfaction.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Strengthen Operational Excellence - drive productivity growth and cost savings through digitization and implementation of customer self-service solutions.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Competitors are for example in the US: Walmart (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/WMT?source=content_type%3Areact%7Csection%3Amain_content%7Cbutton%3Abody_link\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WMT\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"), Kroger (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/KR?source=content_type%3Areact%7Csection%3Amain_content%7Cbutton%3Abody_link\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KR\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"). In Europe, main competitors are for example Carrefour (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/CRERF?source=content_type%3Areact%7Csection%3Amain_content%7Cbutton%3Abody_link\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OTCPK:CRERF\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") Delhaize 2020 annual report\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":245553,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0bf2224d-ddce-439a-888c-ab39053abaa9/Picture6.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0bf2224d-ddce-439a-888c-ab39053abaa9/Picture6.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture6.png\",\"name\":\"Picture6.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0bf2224d-ddce-439a-888c-ab39053abaa9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":703,\"height\":498},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":190192,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/59e894a7-4d78-4036-bda1-193cb077410c/Picture7.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/59e894a7-4d78-4036-bda1-193cb077410c/Picture7.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture7.png\",\"name\":\"Picture7.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"59e894a7-4d78-4036-bda1-193cb077410c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":479,\"height\":388},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":111543,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a788208a-8c3c-4157-af85-3e5d8c8b1450/Captureiii.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a788208a-8c3c-4157-af85-3e5d8c8b1450/Captureiii.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Captureiii.PNG\",\"name\":\"Captureiii.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a788208a-8c3c-4157-af85-3e5d8c8b1450\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":272,\"height\":422},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.aholddelhaize.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ahold Delhaize\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Â is a large European retail company with a number of businesses in various countries integrated into one technical solution created and supported by EPAM team. The release cycle includes monthly upgrades to production for each business. These are rather extensive releases, since more than five countries with different levels of customization depending on the type of business and local specificity are updated simultaneously.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The whole Ahold Delhaize account consists of about 600 specialists who deliver a wide range of different projects. Almost half of them, 250 people, are from Ukraine and specifically from regions which are at the risk (150 people from Kharkiv and 77 from Kyiv). That includes the core part of the team responsible for continuous delivery. However, the team had a delay less than two weeks and after that we were back to our pre-war performance despite the fact that not everyone was able to leave the affected regions. Many of our people stayed in Kharkiv and Kyiv and continued successful delivery.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Apart from slight adjustments in the first month of war, our release schedule was not affected. That is a genuine achievement by our continuous delivery team lead byÂ \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/key/upsaId/4060741400007213893\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Galyna Doksvel\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", considering the scale of these releases and the extremely challenging circumstances.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The clientâs feedback regrading EPAM team in the past months is very positive. They greatly appreciate our teamâs capability and focus on achieving goals. Ahold Delhaize supports Ukraine, too; the companyÂ \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.aholddelhaize.com/en/news/ahold-delhaize-supports-humanitarian-relief-efforts-ukraine/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"donatedÂ \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1,000,000 eurosÂ to the Red Cross to provide humanitarian relief to people fleeing the war.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":104549,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1c0bc158-5c3c-4175-a5f9-c251945a1c80/Picture9.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1c0bc158-5c3c-4175-a5f9-c251945a1c80/Picture9.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture9.png\",\"name\":\"Picture9.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1c0bc158-5c3c-4175-a5f9-c251945a1c80\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":282},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
